Afterburn: Well, theres not much to tell... I used to be an Autobot, but I 
betrayed and joined the Decepticons.  I was moved by Windrazor's strive for 
honor and became his second in command.  Next thing i know, Soundwave dies 
and i'm put in a pod heading to this dust ball. Now i'm just trying to make 
peace.
